properties.publicRemarks: Mid-Century Ranch in prime Northwest Glendale. Situated in one of Glendale's most sought-after pockets, this classic mid-century ranch presents timeless character with modern comforts. Just moments from acclaimed dining, boutique shopping, Glendale Fire, The Americana, and the Glendale Galleria, the location offers both convenience and prestige. Spanning over 2,500 square feet, this single-level residence features three bedrooms with loads of storage capacity in and above closets, and three bathrooms, thoughtfully arranged for both daily living and entertaining. The expansive living and family rooms showcase vaulted, exposed wood-beamed ceilings, custom cabinetry, and a central natural gas fireplaceâ€”creating an atmosphere of warmth and architectural charm. Rich wood floors extend throughout the main living areas and bedrooms, offering seamless continuity and elegance. The kitchen blends functionality with charm, featuring granite countertops, light wood cabinetry, and double ovens, all opening to a generously scaled dining area ideal for hosting. A spacious laundry room enhances day-to-day practicality. Notable upgrades include solar and updated dual-pane, double hung and picture windows for added energy efficiency and comfort, updated electrical and fresh paint throughout. Outdoors, offers a large covered, tiled terrace, the private backyard is lushly landscaped and includes a gazebo, artificial turf, perfect for al fresco dining or quiet retreat and there is room for a good-sized pool. The automated gated driveway leads to a two-car garage, ample parking and turn-around space, providing both security and convenience. Whether cherished as-is or reimagined with a modern design vision, this residence offers lasting appeal in a highly desirable location.
